name: Tahoe Industries
overview:
Tahoe Industries provides power equipment including outdoor and whole house generators. Its generators run on gasoline, natural gas, propane or diesel. Additional Products offered by Tahoe include air compressors, pressure washers, water pumps, standby generators and portable generators.

Tahoe Industries sells compressors, trash pumps, generators, and pressure washers to customers all over North America through a direct sales channels.

Tahoe incorporates a variety of engines on its equipment, including Honda, Yanmar, Yamaha and Shine-Ray.

The company is based and headquartered out of Las Vegas, NV.
